description: Now this is a Movie Star a true classic looking great with the Classic Red Hardtop!! Rare car in original condition in and out...... Full Power with Air Conditioning every Mercedes option. Outstanding with just 72,000 Miles Runs and drive like New! Beautiful paint and a like new fresh rich supple Leather interior that will look great for years to come....... This is a great investment and going up year after year and month after month. Comes with both tops and in great condition monogram floor mats 450SL just the right touch.

title: 1978 Mercedes-Benz 280SL Convertible 1978 In Very Good Condition

description: Mercedes-Benz 280 SL convertible 1978 in very good condition

This Mercedes-Benz 280 SL cabriolet was originally delivered in Europe in 1978. The car has the beautiful paint in colour ‘Silberblau', with a dark blue softtop. This Mercedes has a blue leather interior. The interior is very comfortable and in very good condition. The dashboard has beautiful woodparts. This Mercedes has the original 2746 CC, 6 cyl, 203 HP engine. This Mercedes-Benz 280 SL is a very reliable and comfortable classic car with the original automatic gearbox.

This one owner, all original Mercedes Benz Survivor, is offered for sale at $14,500 The owner bought this car off the lot in 1976 from a dealership in Southern California.  There are 91,373 documented original miles. According to the owner the paint, seats, bumpers, etc. are all original and in excellent shape. The owner maintained the car to the fullest extent he could. The owner's son is selling the car and represents all this information to be true and accurate.The air conditioner pump was replaced in 2000 and works, however, it needs a new belt. The owner recently had the headliner re-done on the hardtop. At the same time they also installed a brand new soft top. We have all of the original manuals on both the car and stereo. The original (and beautifully maintained) wheel caps are also included.This car is truly original and ready for a new owner to enjoy.This car comes complete with the seal of approval from Jim's Classic Garage and qualifies for Jim's Personal Guarantee. Simply put, if a potential buyer were to travel here and walked away without buying the car because the condition of the car was anything other than how we described it on our website, we would pay for their travel expenses. We are able to assist with shipping.

This stunning example of a 300SEL 6.3 has extensive service history with major  components replaced,repaired,or rebuilt.The car measures as original paint.it is in extraordinary condition(looks in person as nice as pictures reflect).The engine just had a compression check performed on November 7,2017,the results were as follows: 1-170 lbs,2-165 lbs,3-175 lbs,4-180 lbs,5-175 lbs,6-160 lbs,7-165 lbs,8-160 lbs.,outstanding compression.The transmission has a fresh rebuild.Stainless steel exhaust,replaced heads by Mercedes franchise in Arizona.I have a recent $10,000 invoice by marque specialist that includes the transmission,steering box,shock absorbers,drive shaft bushings,and brake work.In addition,I have a recent $4347 ticket for air conditioning work.Included in the stack of service receipts is a ticket for $3700 for rebuilt injection pump,timing chain and tensioners,hoses ,gaskets and misc service items.In addition to these tickets there are numerous regular service tickets and maintenance items.The car is stunning cosmetically and mechanically.The air suspension has numerous tickets for repair and rebuild but still will leak down in a two day period.In addition despite the new heads and head gaskets,one gasket is leaking at the back end  of the engine.

Mercedes-Benz 200 Heckflosse 1967 in very good condition

This fabulous Mercedes-Benz was originally new delivered in 1967 and has a very chic Mittelblau paint (350), decorated with the beautiful chrome with chrome wheel covers. Technics are fully checked in our workshop. The brakes were fully revised, steering joints were replaced and a new clutch cylinder was placed. That's why the Mercedes-Benz drives really great. The Heckflosse is easy to handle thanks to the manual gearbox. The beautiful beige leatherette interior offers a lot of comfort. The interior looks chic and the dasboard has the original rectangular clock, a marvelous combination. This perfect driving Mercedes-Benz is ready for a lot of beautiful rides.

title: 1983 Mercedes-Benz 280SL European Version, Beautiful And Very Good Conditio

description: Mercedes-Benz SL 280 1983 European version, beautiful and very good condition

The Mercedes-Benz SL R107 is a German sportsconvertible and was the successor of the Pagode back then. This is a 1983 SL 280 cabriolet. It is an european version. Both the in- and outside are in a beautiful condition.The paint is in colour grey metallic, original rims, half leather interior with woodparts in the dashboard. The car has the reliable 6 cyl engine and 5 speed manual gearbox. The car is in Holland since 1993. The car also has a blue mohair softtop and an original hardtop. So a very beautiful and technically in very good condition Mercedes-Benz SL 280.

description: This stunning classic Signal red /Palomino leather two owner 560SL is all one seeks out when shopping a classic  Mercedes Roadster.The car is accident and rust free.The second owner purchased the car with 10,000 miles on it and lovingly cared  and preserved  the car.The car comes with extensive documentation of services performed,one knows immediately upon a short drive this has been a well serviced example.The car runs tight,strong,void of rattles,pulsating and hesitation,all very smooth and tight.The car is a non-smokers car.The wood is void of cracks,the leather well preserved,no cracks on the dash.The soft top looks new as does the soft top boot,carriage and mechanisms.The carpet is void of spoilage.The seats sit up  not broken down from weight or age.The paint is nearly flawless,the stainless steel overlays on bumpers are without flaw.The car comes with the original window sticker,original bill of sale,bill of sale to second owner,all brochures,manuals,tools.Review the pictures posted,if the car has interest,contact me at 615-971-4409.The  car is located in the Nashville Tn metro area.Independent inspections are welcomed and encouraged.There will be an additional $299 dealer doc fee assessed to each sales transaction.This and other European collectibles may be reviewed at JPFRAZIER.com
